mapper.select: SELECT EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ AS partnerEzwelSeq /* 제휴사 이지웰 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR /* 제휴사 이지웰 담당자 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MGR.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ = #{partnerEzwelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 제휴사 이지웰 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR /* 제휴사 이지웰 담당자 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MGR.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ = #{partnerEzwelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 제휴사 이지웰 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ AS partnerEzwelSeq /* 제휴사 이지웰 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD AS partnerCd /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID AS mgrId /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR /* 제휴사 이지웰 담당자 */ ,EZC_MGR /* 운영자 정보 */ ,EZC_CLIENT_INFO /* 고객사 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID = EZC_MGR.MGR_ID AND EZC_MGR.CLIENT_CD = EZC_CLIENT_INFO.CLIENT_CD AND EZC_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MGR.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CLIENT_INFO.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ = #{param.partnerEzwelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 제휴사 이지웰 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_CD = #{param.partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.MGR_ID = #{param.mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
ORDER BY EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR.PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR SET /* 제휴사 이지웰 담당자 */ MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ = #{partnerEzwelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 제휴사 이지웰 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_PARTNER_EZWEL_MGR /* 제휴사 이지웰 담당자 */ WHERE 1=1 AND PARTNER_EZWEL_SEQ = #{partnerEzwelSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 제휴사 이지웰 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND PARTNER_CD = #{partnerCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 코드, VARCHAR2(20) */ AND MGR_ID = #{mgrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 운영자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
